member.name: P:Elect.Job.Hangfire.Models.ElectHangfireOptions.IsDisableJobDashboard
member.summary: Disable or Enable Job Dashboard, default is false.

member.name: P:Elect.Job.Hangfire.Models.ElectHangfireOptions.BackToUrl
member.summary: URL for back button in Job Dashboard. Set to to hide the Back To Site link, default is "/".

member.name: P:Elect.Job.Hangfire.Models.ElectHangfireOptions.AccessKey
member.summary: Access Key via uri param "key", default is "" - allow anonymous.

member.name: P:Elect.Job.Hangfire.Models.ElectHangfireOptions.UnAuthorizeMessage
member.summary: Un-authorize message when user access Job Dashboard with not correct key. Default is "You don't have permission to view API Document, please contact your administrator."

member.name: P:Elect.Job.Hangfire.Models.ElectHangfireOptions.StatsPollingInterval
member.summary: The interval the /stats endpoint should be polled with (milliseconds), default is 2000.

member.name: P:Elect.Job.Hangfire.Models.ElectHangfireOptions.ExtendOptions
member.summary: Additional Options if you want to add your customize after Elect add Hangfire Global Config.
